title: Manual of Afrotropical Diptera, Volume 3: Brachycera–Cyclorrhapha, excluding Calyptratae
content: Manual of Afrotropical Diptera, Volume 3: Brachycera–Cyclorrhapha, excluding Calyptratae Edited by Ashley H. Kirk-Spriggs & Bradley J. Sinclair 2021; 1,014 pp. Suricata 8. South African National Biodiversity Institute, Pretoria. ISBN: 978-1-928224-13-6 (hardcover)
